bafb33bb-4885-4d3d-805e-c5141cbc1125: "Energy regulation system: unknown error. WARNING! Backup generator connected."
ddeb5622-018f-48ec-8423-2572fdeaa070: "Oxygen supply system: failed. WARNING! Air filters damaged."
aa957b35-2ffd-42eb-a4a2-a8f3249f60c8: "System check... Processing input data... Data confirmed. Compressor launch in progress. Pressure levels nominal. WARNING! Error 110011 110000 110011 encountered: insufficient power. Booting emergency energy profiles... Success. Pressurising facility... Success. Booting compressor... Success. Emergency air filters: activated. Automated defence systems: activated."
0bac8d9c-f47a-4355-a5e9-fbc45f30cc78: "Temperature and humidity control system: failed. Reason: unknown."
df8aeda9-cc00-4dde-b075-bdb009ea70e5: "WARNING: request denied. Air duct system malfunction detected."
5a63672c-0b73-4db0-ba08-6a8da9afc7b7: [Request status of the bunker's life support system]
e2c03ad9-1572-4973-991b-4deaa88509ed: {n}Pasqal offers the cogitator a reverent bow, chanting the binharic aria of launch priming.{/n} "The spirit of this machine embodies resilience and indomitability. In this den of decay and entropy, still does it reign over this place."
ee2f3341-3eec-43b7-8362-5dcd49e273a5: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves the faithful."
